page.title: 04Mavis Enderby.
page.content: Mavis Enderby is a small village on the outskirts of Spilsby. It has an old church and a village green. I think it used to have a blacksmith as I have found many horseshoes and tiny clay pipes in the vicinity. The village is surrounded by farm land on which there are four main farms. These are called Eastfield, Southfield, Highfield and Harrison farms. The buildings of Harrison farm have now become a large store house for machines and are sometimes used for disco dances. Mavis Enderby has a population of about 100 persons, many of whom are senior citizens. It is a nice place to live, rather quiet but it can be fun in the winter. My hobby is dancing and for this I have to travel regularly to Skegness; a distance of l6 miles.
